recipe_name: Warm Lemon, Honey, and Ginger Soother
ingredients: +   1/4 cup honey, or to taste, 1  lemon, juiced, 1 tablespoon finely grated ginger root,   +   1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 3   +   1/2 cups boiling water
